mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, ID, PW, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE, PW_MODIFY_DATE, INFO_MODIFY_DATE, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT_DATE, USER_LEVEL, POINT FROM USERS ORDER BY USER_NO

SELECT USER_NO, ID, PW, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE, PW_MODIFY_DATE, INFO_MODIFY_DATE, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT_DATE, USER_LEVEL, POINT FROM USERS WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RETIRE_USERS (USER_NO, ID, JOIN_DATE, RETIRE_DATE) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{id}, #{joinDate}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UPLOAD L LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS U ON L.ID = U.ID
SELECT USER_NO, ID,JOIN_DATE, RETIRE_DATE FROM RETIRE_USERS ORDER BY USER_NO
